Brief, BRIEF AMICUS CURIAE OF THE EQUAL EMPLOYMENT ADVISORY COUNCIL IN SUPPORT OF RESPONDENTThe Equal Employment Advisory Council respectfully submits this brief amicus curiae. n1 The written consent of all parties has been filed with the Clerk of this Court.
